TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChannelProtectionRequirements extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Describes encryption and signature requirements that apply to different parts of messages that are transmitted on this channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When extending the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> class, you must implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement.GetProperty%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29> so that it returns an instance of this class corresponding to the binding element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This default constructor sets the following properties to a new instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>, which is a class that specifies which parts are included in a message:
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingEncryptionParts%2A>,
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingSignatureParts%2A>,
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingEncryptionParts%2A>, and
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingSignatureParts%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements other) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from another instance of this class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor sets the following properties to a new instance of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification>, using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification.%23ctor%2A> constructor, with `other` as the input parameter. <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ScopedMessagePartSpecification> is a class that specifies which parts are included in a message:
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingEncryptionParts%2A>,
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IncomingSignatureParts%2A>,
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingEncryptionParts%2A>, and
- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.OutgoingSignatureParts%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements protectionRequirements) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds the parts collections in the specified to the current instance of this class.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Add (System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements protectionRequirements, bool channelScopeOnly);
.method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements protectionRequirements, bool channelScopeOnly) cil managed

Docs.param: Specifies whether the scope is channel-only.
Docs.summary: Adds the various parts collections in the specified to the current instance of this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements CreateInverse() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance of this class with incoming and outgoing parts reversed.
Docs.returns: A new instance of this class with incoming and outgoing parts reversed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Incoming parts of the current instance of this class become outgoing parts of the new instance. Outgoing parts of the current instance of this class become incoming parts of the new instance.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of message parts that are encrypted for messages from client to server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is set in the constructor.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of message parts that are signed for messages from client to server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is set in the constructor.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether this instance of the class is read-only.
Docs.value: if this instance of the class is read-only; otherwise, . The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void MakeReadOnly() cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets this class and its part collections to read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.ChannelProtectionRequirements.IsReadOnly%2A> is set to true, as are the corresponding properties on the parts collections.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of message parts that are encrypted for messages from server to client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is set in the constructor.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of message parts that are signed for messages from server to client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is set in the constructor.
